Html:
How to create a dynamic splash screen without minimize, maximize and close button that can perform and display warmup/start up progress, ultimately destroy itself and launch the MainWindow?

Can we have a template available in Add new item section?
This is a more general WPF question; see also http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc656886.aspx. There are no plans to add a splashscreen template.

if you happy with the static splash screen you should have a look this answer: Static splash screen. I'm pretty sure that it's possible to make it dynamic (e.g. progress bar or messaging) by implementing events, but I didn't try it yet.
Thanks, poborin. Static splash screens - yes, I am aware of those.
